tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SponsorshipDeals (
id INT PRIMARY KEY,
brand_name VARCHAR(255),
festival_name VARCHAR(255),
amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
start_date DATE,
end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SponsorshipDeals (
    deal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    festival_name VARCHAR(255),
    brand_name VARCHAR(255),
    deal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE BrandContacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE FestivalDetails (
    festival_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    festival_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    ticket_price DECIMAL(8, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE festival (
    festival_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    festival_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE brand (
    brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_name TEXT,
    industry TEXT,
    contact_person TEXT,
    email TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE sponsorship_deal (
    deal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    festival_id INT,
    brand_id INT,
    deal_amount DECIMAL,
    deal_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (festival_id) REFERENCES festival(festival_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES brand(brand_id)
);

CREATE TABLE agreement (
    agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    deal_id INT,
    details TEXT,
    signed_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (deal_id) REFERENCES sponsorship_deal(deal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Sponsorship_Deals (
    deal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id INT,
    festival_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Festivals (
    festival_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    festival_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Brand_Contact (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id INT,
    contact_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);
